document_data.mainbody:
Auziiyra Twelvestars was a human mage of Tethyr.
Alongside Brondeth of the Broken Staff and several other mages, Auziiyra was guarding a human mining community when they were attacked by drow. The mages used the wonderform spell to hide in the form of wingless wonders and escape being killed, but became lost in the Underdark. They were thought to still be wandering the Night Below by the midâ€“14 century DR.
